</items>   </channel>       <item rdf:about="http://www.nactem.ac.uk/files/G2S.pdf">     <title>NaCTeM is sponsoring the Text Mining strand of the Genomes to Systems Conference 2008, which takes place on the 17-19 March 2008 in Manchester, UK.</title>     <link>http://www.nactem.ac.uk/files/G2S.pdf</link>     <description>NaCTeM at Genomes to Systems Conference 2008.</description>     <dc:creator>NaCTeM</dc:creator>     <dc:date>2007-10-18</dc:date>       </item>     <item rdf:about="http://www.nactem.ac.uk/news.php#45">     <title>Towards Text Mining Terabytes fo Text Documents</title>     <link>http://www.nactem.ac.uk/news.php#45</link>     <description>NaCTeM at Microsoft eScience Conference 2007.</description>     <dc:creator>NaCTeM</dc:creator>     <dc:date>2007-09-08</dc:date>       </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.nactem.ac.uk/news.php#46">     <title>NaCTeM at Supercomputing 2007</title>     <link>http://www.nactem.ac.uk/news.php#46</link>     <description>Dr Firat Tekiner and Dr Sophia Ananiadou will be demonstrating at the UK e-Science Pavillion at Supercomputing 2007..</description>     <dc:creator>NaCTeM</dc:creator>     <dc:date>2007-09-12</dc:date>       </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.nactem.ac.uk/news.php#42">     <title>Text Mining / Bioinformatics Symposium</title>     <link>http://www.nactem.ac.uk/news.php#42</link>     <description>17 July 2007 \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd MIB Lecture Theatre, University of Manchester. We are uniquely positioned at Manchester to   capitalise on the interaction between these two disciplines, and we hope that this informal, half-day event will allow us to gain a better appreciation for the current activities that bridge these communities, and  stimulate ideas for new projects and grant proposals in these areas.</description>     <dc:creator>NaCTeM</dc:creator>     <dc:date>2007-07-08</dc:date>       </item>     <item rdf:about="http://www.nactem.ac.uk/news.php#32">     <title>Strategic alliance with IBM: Partner programme</title>     <link>http://www.nactem.ac.uk/news.php#32</link>     <description>The University of Manchester and IBM launched The University of  Manchester-IBM Partners Programme to facilitate the identification and  delivery of activities where the two institutions can assist each other  in attaining key business, research and teaching goals. Dr Sophia Ananiadou (Manchester) will be working in partership with Dr Tetsuya Nasukawa (IBM) on Interoperability of text mining tools. More information: www.manchester.ac.uk/business/working/ibm/partner/</description>     <dc:creator>NaCTeM</dc:creator>     <dc:date>2006-03-08</dc:date>       </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.nactem.ac.uk/news.php#33">     <title>European Text Analytics Summit</title>     <link>http://www.nactem.ac.uk/news.php#33</link>     <description>Dr Sophia Ananiadou is a speaker at The European Text Analytics Summit which will take place 26-27 April at the Marriot Hotel in Amsterdam. A white paper that has been commissioned for the European Text Analytics Summit    is available  to download  "European Text Analytics" [Seth Grimes].</description>     <dc:creator>NaCTeM</dc:creator>     <dc:date>2007-03-08</dc:date>       </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.nactem.ac.uk/news.php#31">     <title>Invited Lecture</title>     <link>http://www.nactem.ac.uk/news.php#31</link>     <description>In January, Dr Yoshimasa Tsuruoka gave an invited lecture at the IJCAI-07 Workshop on Shallow Parsing in South Asian Languages.</description>     <dc:creator>NaCTeM</dc:creator>     <dc:date>2007-02-19</dc:date>       </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.nactem.ac.uk/news.php#30">     <title>Tokyo Forum on Advanced NLP and TM</title>     <link>http://www.nactem.ac.uk/news.php#30</link>     <description>T-FaNT 07, organised by Professor Tsujii. The objective of this workshop is to exchange information on on-going projects, research results and new ideas on NLP-based Text Mining, Intelligent Text Management Systems, Bio-NLP, Deep Parsing and its application, Knowledge-based NLP, Machine Learning and NLP, Ontology Building and Interoperability and Adaptability of NLP tools. The workshop takes place March 11 - March 13 2007 at the University of Tokyo, Japan.</description>     <dc:creator>NaCTeM</dc:creator>     <dc:date>2007-02-11</dc:date>       </item>     </rdf:RDF>
